title: Outgoing Greek ambassador pays farewell call on foreign secretary
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 12 (APP): Outgoing Ambassador of Greece in Pakistan Andreas Papastavrou Wednesday paid a farewell call on Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood here.
The foreign secretary appreciated the ambassadorâ€™s contributions towards strengthening bilateral relations between Pakistan and Greece.
He hoped that the momentum generated during his tenure would advance further and also wished him well in his future endeavours.
